content: Yeah, I'm really excited to try it out! I think the white linen pants will be a great match for the blouse. By the way, speaking of H&M, I've been frequenting their store in the mall a lot lately. I've already made three trips there, and I've picked up some great pieces, including a few summer dresses and a trendy pair of sneakers. Have you heard about their summer sale? I heard it's coming up soon.
